column5: I was going to show you guys pics, but it keeps saying my file is too big.  Can anyone help me?  Monsterfish
upload to photobucket and use the img code
...very disappointing.    Just kidding, I'll check it out once you get photo posted. Dan has it right. Copy and paste the img code onto your post and then preview it to make sure it worked.

Thanks for the help guys! That was my first post with pictures, hopefully more to come.  I have never fished Lake O. I went on Tuesday with Top Catch Charters out of Newcastle, a great time on the water. The 38' boat helped make the rough seas tolerable.  Keep your hooks sharp!
Yes, your file is too big. Next time out, catch a smaller fish and you should be fine :-)  Nice 'bow - congrats.
Way to go!  Beauty of a fish there.  Looking forward to more reports and pics!
Congrats nice start!, caution is advised - this body of water can be addictive due to its ability to consistently produce nice fish
